text: (napiye!) Niccayamaka allahtan vanattiliruntu malaiyai irakkivaikkiran enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya? Nam ataik kontu palavitamana (rucikalaiyum) nirankalaiyu(mu)taiya kaykanikalai veliyakkukirom. Innum malaikalil vellai, cikappu mutaliya pala nirankal ullavaiyum, cuttakkaruppu niram ullavaiyum irukkinrana
